data.text: @V40460101 @1NewsNZ I should edit that as, in this case, it was a case of losing individual freedoms to protect collective freedoms
@V40460101 @1NewsNZ But the mandates are 1) not illegal & 2) served a purpose. As you've seen, as that purpose changes, the mandates change.  Immoral perhaps, not illegal

@qrsball @1NewsNZ I’m ok that we disagree Quentin.
And I respect your right to choose.
Illegal mandates where people lose lives jobs and businesses will be overturned.
The truth will come out.
@V40460101 @1NewsNZ But you've drunk that coolade and are just spamming those lies ....
@1NewsNZ Boy them 2X jabs and booster sure are working a treat 😉

@qrsball @1NewsNZ You should be referring that comment to ms ardern my friend.
How about a balanced transparent debate, instead of ‘one single source of truth’.
I honestly wish none of this were true.
But if people stop drinking her coolade and scratch a little below the surface you will see holes
@V40460101 @1NewsNZ Turn the bot off & stop spewing disinformation!!
